sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Navbar, Nav, Container } from 'react-bootstrap';
import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap';
import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom';

function Navigation() {
  const location = useLocation();

  return (
    <Navbar expand="lg" className="navbar">
      <Container>
        <Navbar.Brand href="/">
          Ghost Identity Protection
        </Navbar.Brand>
        <Navbar.Toggle aria-controls="basic-navbar-nav" />
        <Navbar.Collapse id="basic-navbar-nav">
          <Nav className="ms-auto">
            <LinkContainer to="/">
              <Nav.Link className={location.pathname === '/' ? 'active' : ''}>
                Dashboard
              </Nav.Link>
            </LinkContainer>
            <LinkContainer to="/vault">
              <Nav.Link className={location.pathname === '/vault' ? 'active' : ''}>
                Digital Vault
              </Nav.Link>
            </LinkContainer>
            <LinkContainer to="/policies">
              <Nav.Link className={location.pathname === '/policies' ? 'active' : ''}>
                Action Policies
              </Nav.Link>
            </LinkContainer>
            <LinkContainer to="/trusted-contact">
              <Nav.Link className={location.pathname === '/trusted-contact' ? 'active' : ''}>
                Trusted Contacts
              </Nav.Link>
            </LinkContainer>
            <LinkContainer to="/admin">
              <Nav.Link className={location.pathname === '/admin' ? 'active' : ''}>
                Administration
              </Nav.Link>
            </LinkContainer>
          </Nav>
        </Navbar.Collapse>
      </Container>
    </Navbar>
  );
}

export default Navigation;
